alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 2:54PM PST until December 12 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 9 to 16 inches, mainly above 3000 feet. Snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches possible as low as 2000 feet. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult at times, with low visibility due to heavy snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
